titles.title: Defense Infrastructure Support Act
Defense Infrastructure Support Act

A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to extend the authorization of use of depot working capital funds for unspecified minor military construction projects for the revitalization and recapitalization of defense industrial base facilities.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Defense Infrastructure Support Act
This bill extends to September 30, 2025, the authority of the Department of Defense to use a working capital fund for unspecified minor military construction projects to revitalize and recapitalize defense industrial base facilities.
